text: hello, how do I reset global partial to its original state?

Hello everyone, got a question if anyone can help, I'm following the dev docs guide for modules . There is a part where it explains how to customize a module in a template. In it I have the following object/dictionary
```{% dnd_module path='../modules/Testimonial.module',
  customer_name = "Mary",
  profile_pic = {
    src: "{{ get_asset_url('../images/profile-pic-mary.svg') }}",
    alt: "Mary Profile Picture"
  }
%}```
This lets me customize the picture, and here is where I have an issue, if the value for the "alt" key has spaces that img html tag will set the other words as attributes like so: <img class="testimonial__picture" src="" alt="Mary" profile picture>  - is this a bug?

We also have a lot of tips for performance optimization in docs:
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/guides/speed>
